Title: VP Operations
Pain Points Identified: Natural/organic product tracking, complex inventory management, multi-location coordination
Notes: Specializes in natural and organic products - growing market, good target for automation

Title: Operations Manager
Pain Points Identified: Regional distribution challenges, inventory forecasting, order processing efficiency
Notes: Family-owned, regional focus - may need modernization, good opportunity

Title: Branch Manager
Pain Points Identified: Multi-location inventory sync, contractor relationship management, job site delivery coordination
Notes: Large network of branches - each branch is independent, good scalability opportunity

Title: Regional Operations Manager
Pain Points Identified: Roofing and pool supplies distribution, seasonal demand fluctuations, contractor pricing tiers
Notes: Specialized in roofing/pool - niche market with specific needs

Title: Regional Operations Manager
Pain Points Identified: Aftermarket parts inventory management, recycling operations coordination, multi-location tracking
Notes: Large company but regional offices may have autonomy - good entry point

Title: Operations Director
Pain Points Identified: Collision parts distribution, complex SKU management, return/core tracking
Notes: Collision parts specialist - unique inventory challenges, good niche

Title: Operations Manager
Pain Points Identified: Consumer electronics distribution, B2B portal needs, rapid product obsolescence tracking
Notes: Mid-size electronics distributor - likely needs better B2B portal

Title: VP Operations
Pain Points Identified: Pro AV distribution, technical training coordination, dealer support systems
Notes: Specialized in Pro AV - may need dealer portal and training management

Title: Regional Manager
Pain Points Identified: MRO distribution efficiency, technical support coordination, vending machine management
Notes: Large MRO distributor - regional offices may have pain points

Title: CEO/Owner
Pain Points Identified: Mobile accessories distribution, inventory accuracy, order processing speed, limited tech budget
Notes: Smaller company - perfect size for your services, owner-operated means faster decisions
